column4: Hello, I have a problem with ubuntu on netbook. There is no USB image for Desktop. Why? There is usb-creator tool, but it works under Windows, Ubuntu and Mac. I have no such OSes. So I can't convert. The question is why Ubuntu isn't shipped with USB drive image as good distros?
are you saying that when you mount a usb drive, it doesn't show a little usb icon?
I am saying that where are no LiveUSB images
Ah, I missed that completely, sorry. :)
